item.title: Pre-registered delegates can access a report on industry innovations through Food&HotelAsia
item.description:
To commemorate its 40th anniversary, Food&HotelAsia (FHA) has partnered with Euromonitor International to release a new white paper. Titled “Smart Innovations Transforming the Food and Hospitality Landscape by 2020,” the 20-page report examines significant disruptions influencing the industry. Based on research conducted by UBM and Euromonitor, the white paper incorporates insights from a survey of over 1,000 suppliers and manufacturers across key food, hotel, and food service equipment sectors in Asia...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/pre-registered-delegates-can-access-a-report-on-industry-innovations-through-food-hotelasia/
